item.title: The math behind juggling
item.description: This post explains how math can be applied to juggling, a seemingly non-mathematical area. This gives us more insight into what really goes on in a juggling pattern and helps us automate the process of finding new juggling patterns.
item.dc:creator: Eklavya Sharma

item.title: Generalizing Segment Trees
